alert.note: Alert for Barnstable; Eastern Essex; Eastern Norfolk; Eastern Plymouth; Nantucket; Suffolk (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Coastal Flood Advisory issued January 09 at 11:20AM EST until January 10 at 12:00PM EST by NWS Boston
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 8 AM TO NOON EST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...One to two feet of inundation above ground level expected in low-lying areas near shorelines and tidal waterways (4.3 to 13.0 feet Mean Lower Low Water). * WHERE...Eastern Essex MA, Suffolk MA, Eastern Norfolk MA, Eastern Plymouth MA, Barnstable MA and Nantucket MA Counties. * WHEN...From 8 AM to noon EST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Minor coastal flooding occurs along Morrissey Boulevard in Boston. Coastal flooding is expected along the North Shore from Marblehead northward along the coast to Newburyport. The combination of high tides and large swells will result in flooding of some immediate coastal roads and some road closures are anticipated. Minor coastal flooding begins on Easy Street in Nantucket. Minor coastal flooding is expected in the area including Wings Neck. && Time of high total tides are approximate to the nearest hour. info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property.
